welcome_message_body: Welcome to Eastleigh, a charming town known for its vibrant markets, beautiful green spaces, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that this wonderful city has to offer during your visit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southampton Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Southampton Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Goodwood Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Goodwood Airport caters to luxury and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bembridge Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bournemouth International Airport is a modern facility with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Bournemouth International Airport is equipped to handle a variety of cargo and freight needs.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upavon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Upavon Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the wifi network for free by selecting the 'UpavonAirportWifi' network and following the prompts.
